entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
